sentence.Network_en: Parish priests have referred to it in their sermons.
sentence.Network_cn: 堂区牧师在布道中提到了它。

sentence.Network_en: Few things distracted the Pastor from the preparation of his weekly sermons.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎没有什么事情能使牧师在准备每周的布道时分神。

sentence.Network_en: a preacher famous for her inspiring sermons
sentence.Network_cn: 以发人深省的讲道出名的传道者

PerfectNetExp.abs: church sermons often deal with contemporary problems and the duty of right-thinking men in solving them and churches are active in reform movement of all kinds .教堂宣道往往论及当代问题以及正直的人在解决这些问题时所肩负的职责，教会也积极参加各种改革运动。
When you hear his sermons , you will be able to believe , too ., 当你听到他说教时 , 你也会相信的.
the seven sermons to the dead ., 向死者的七次布道.

list.abs: An eloquent speaker ; an eloquent sermon ., 一个雄辩的演讲家 ; 雄辩的说教.
a good example is the best sermon ., 好的榜样就是最好的说教.
The sermon predicated the perfectibility of humankind ., 这篇布道文断言了人类的完美性.

entry.def: A sermon is a talk on a religious or moral subject that is given by a member of the clergy as part of a church service.
